subject: Basketball
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Webster was the 7-foot-1 shot-blocking center known as the Human Eraser, who took the Seattle SuperSonics to the 1978 N.B.A. finals, then spent six seasons with the Knicks.
snippet: Mr. Webster was the 7-foot-1 shot-blocking center known as the Human Eraser, who took the Seattle SuperSonics to the 1978 N.B.A. finals, then spent six seasons with the Knicks.
